game.name: Korrin Horne
game.shortDescription: Play as Korrin Horne — an enforcer surviving in the ruins of collapsing megacities. Battle rogue machines, upgrade your gear, and uncover the dark truths buried beneath layers of steel and ash.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as Korrin Horne — an enforcer surviving in the ruins of collapsing megacities. Battle rogue machines, upgrade your gear, and uncover the dark truths buried beneath layers of steel and ash.
